application.name: Hanbury Brown Twiss Experiment
application.description: Hanbury Brown and Twiss (HBT) effect is any of a variety of correlation and anti-correlation effects in the intensities received by two detectors from a beam of particles.

tool.name: Hanbury Brown Twiss Experiment
tool.description: View the simulated Hanbury Brown and Twiss effect here!
tool.introduction: Hanbury Brown and Twiss (HBT) effect is any of a variety of correlation and anti-correlation effects in the intensities received by two detectors from a beam of particles.

questions.title: What does the HBT experiment prove?
questions.text: The experiment checks whether there is a correlation or anti-correlation effect between the intensities received by two detectors from a beam of particles.
